text: Leonard Edwin Wild (22 January 1935 - 10 July 2020) was a Canadian basketball player. He competed in the men's tournament at the 1956 Summer Olympics. He was born in Vancouver, British Columbia. Wild died on 10 July 2020 in Vancouver, aged 85. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1935 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Olympians for Canada Category:Canadian basketball players Category:Sportspeople from Vancouver
title: Ed Wild
